name: Crowd Control (Del / birdpun)
description:
Crowd Control is a minigame based loosely off Gabriel García Márquez's short story, "A Very Old Man with Enormous Wings". 

Team

Del Nordlund

Jen Stienstra

Tools 
  • Unity
    • iTween
    • Fungus
  • FMOD
  • Reaper
  • Photoshop
Controls

Press space to whack the crowd when they get aggressive
